page.title: 07Yvonne Adams (8)Ordinary day
page.content: We get up at 8 o'clock and I get my clothes and go downstairs and get dressed. After we have got dressed Mummy cooks the toast and then I eat my toast. When I have finished my toast I put breakfast televison on I watch television for a while and then go and play with my toys. I like playing with my Sindy best. Sometimes a friend comes to play and if its fine we play in the garden. Mummy cooks the dinner. After dinner I play again or sometimes granny comes. At tea time I watch chidrens television. I like Blue Peter best I go to bed at about 9o'clock
